title: Making a Difference
description: From a colour converting Chameleon to an astounding architect, Dick and Dom present some of the top 50 stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition 2018
itunes:subtitle: Written for kids, by kids: accounts of changes and amazing achievements
